text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yoo-hoo, Trainer! I brought some lucky news for you today!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Believe it or not, a collaboration campaign with 'Tokyo Mega Illumination' is going to be held!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Apparently, they'll be handing out Christmas presents every day...

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ...there will be events where we get to hype up the Christmas spirit...

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ...and you might even get items by tapping the small gift placed right here. It looks like a whole lot of happy events are coming our way!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: So, let's have fun together, okay? Rickey☆ Lucky☆ Merry Christmas☆
